import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { OrderService } from 'src/app/services/order/order.service'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; @Component({ selector: 'app-order-sucess', templateUrl: './order-sucess.page.html', styleUrls: ['./order-sucess.page.scss'], }) export class OrderSucessPage implements OnInit { constructor(public orderServices : OrderService,public router : Router) { } ngOnInit() { } viewOrderDetails() { this.orderServices.getOrderDetails(); this.router.navigate(["/tabs/orders"]) } }
